title: Grand House for rent (4410 Bothell)
posting_body: Great house with great construction quality for rent!
- Located in highly desired neighborhood.
- Vaulted ceiling entry; 4BD+2.5BA+office room+open space for living & dining room
- Gourmet kitchen with solid Quartz countertops, extraction hood over large 5 burner cook top, soft close drawers.
- Elegant master suite has large sitting room, 5 piece master bath and large walk-in closet.
- French doors leading to a recently built entertaining deck
- Nice School District
Address: 4410 214th Place SE, Bothell, WA 98012
Tenant responsible for electricity / gas / water / sewer / garbage / internet
Tenants must have a minimum credit score of 700
Available 09/01.
Lease term: 8 months, ""extension after first term with new rate is possible.""
No refundable application fee: $40/person.
One month holding fee is due on signing.....will converted to security deposit upon move-in.
To see this rental, please call/text Charlie Chen (TEXT PREFERRED), email: rentals @ <URL>
Please mention 4410 Bothell when you call.
Online application: <URL>
* Valid photo ID & proof of income are needed for the application.
* Credit check required for all adult occupants.
* Equal Housing Opportunity
First come, first serve.
* Groups of more than one applicant will not be considered until the complete application packages from all members of the group are received.
